```{r}
library(magick)
library(bohemia)
library(qrcode)
library(tidyverse)

codes <- paste0('ABC-', 111:123)
image_files <- c('1.png', '2.png')

if(!dir.exists('certificates_simple')){
  dir.create('certificates_simple/')
}

for(i in 1:length(codes)){
  this_code <- codes[i]
  for(j in 1:length(image_files)){
    this_image_file <- image_files[j]
    out_name <- paste0(
      'certificates_simple/',
      this_code,
      ifelse(this_image_file == '1.png', '_sw', '_pt'),
      '.png'
    )
    hh_qr_code_print_simple(hh_id = this_code,
                     save_file = out_name,
                     height=3.5,
                     width=3)
  }
}
```
